name: marikobot-hashi
description: A cool discord.js wrapper to create bots in a simpler way.

scripts.build: npm run run-builder && npm run prettier && tsc && npm run save
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git commit -m "[AUTO] dev build"
scripts.dev-patch: npm run prepublish && npm run publish-patch
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.publish-alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
